# Data Visualization and Careers 

If you're interested in learning more about data viz, check out [this course](https://catalog.unomaha.edu/search/?P=STAT%204420). 

Or there are free options, such as [R4DS Online Learning Community](https://rfordatasci.com/). This is honestly one of the best options for getting your feet wet in data viz. 

There is also the [R Ladies](https://rladies.org/), who's mission is to promote gender diversity in data science communities. 

**You can make a career out of it.**
